original_title: Police probing death of man who fell off apartment in Wellawatte
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police launched an investigation into the death of a 24-year-old man who fell off a housing complex in Wellawatte.
Police said the man had fallen off the 8th floor of an apartment building in Wellawatte, and he died upon admission to the Kalubowila Hospital.
